name: Solari Chargeblade
passive: Energize: Moving and attacking builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack deals bonus magic damage to up to 4 enemies.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Moving and attacking builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack deals bonus magic damage to up to 4 enemies.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
